subject: Pedal Haptic Order
description_text:
Hello,
           I recently placed an order for 2 haptic motors under the name
Brenden Moennig. The adress is 216 East Prospect, Pierre, South Dakota,
57501. I thought I attached my email to the order but I have no order
confirmation other than the charge on my card now that I’ve refreshed the
page. When I enter my account email on the Simsonn site, it shows I have no
orders. Is there anyway you could provide tracking information for my order
please?

conversations.body_text: Hi Brenden Moennig,  Don’t worry. Please provide the date and time of your payment, and we may be able to locate your order and then get back to you with the tracking information.

It was yesterday evening around 11pm

On Tue, Aug 26, 2025 at 11:57 PM service@simsonn.com
Hello, your email address was entered incorrectly, causing the order confirmation to fail. We have updated it to the correct address and resent the shipping notification. Please check your inbox.

That's great, thank you for fixing it I can see my order now. Thank you!!

On Wed, Aug 27, 2025 at 10:33 PM service@simsonn.com
